recent class "Introduction to Gato". Now that the class has
concluded, we'd love to get your feedback!

We've prepared a very quick, 5 question survey that won't
take more than 3 minutes of your time -- we promise!
Please click here
(http://localhost:3000/survey_responses/new?reservation_id=360065586)
to take the survey, and accept our thanks.

Thanks in advance for your feedback! We really
hope you enjoyed the class. To find more classes offered by
ITS or other departments, check out the list of upcoming
sessions here (http://localhost:3000/).
